name: postcss-iconfont
description: Create SVG/TTF/EOT/WOFF/WOFF2 fonts from several SVG icons with PostCSS

0.9.0.name: postcss-iconfont
0.9.0.description: Create icon fonts from several SVG icons

0.9.1.name: postcss-iconfont
0.9.1.description: Create SVG/TTF/EOT/WOFF/WOFF2 fonts from several SVG icons with PostCSS

scripts.cover: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha test/index.js --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
